author: kskovpen
body:
#### PR description:

Update Run2022 data wfs for release validation in preparation for the upcoming data reprocessing campaign.

#### PR validation:

This update is similar to #39265. The validation will be triggered upon the progress on the corresponding [transfer request](https://its.cern.ch/jira/projects/CMSTRANSF/issues/CMSTRANSF-437) for the input RAW data to CERN T2.

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. 

We will need this PR backported to 12_4_X and merged in the successor of 12_4_10.
title: Update Run2022 relval wfs
